item.title: Rockin Roary - All I Want For Christmas
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas Easy
All I Want For Christmas Is My two front Teeth Written by Don Gardener
Using the chords: Am C D7 E7 F G7
Suggested Strum Pattern: D DU D DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.

item.title: Somebody To Love Connor Maynard C G Am F
Billie Eilish - come out and play
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Come Out And Play - Billie Eilish
Using the chords: Am C Cmaj7 Dm Em F G G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: Single strums or D DU D DU (slow)
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: We Wish You A Merry Christmas - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
We Wish You A Merry Christmas - Traditional
Using the chords: A Am B C D Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D D D or D DU DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.

item.title: Ella Fitzgerald - Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas - Ella Fitzgerald version
Using the chords: A7 Am B7 Bm C D D7 E7 Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Steven Universe - We Are the Crystal Gems
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Keys of F & G.
Chords Used: F, A7, Bb, C, Bbm, Gm7, Am7, Bbm7, E7, Am, Dm, G, Cmaj7, D7, C7, B7, Cm, Em, Gmaj7
As performed on Steven Universe
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/pdzcOAduI8E
******************** Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion.
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).

Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Thanksgiving Song - Ukulele Play Along (with lyrics)
item.description:
Thanksgiving Song by Mary Chapin Carpenter. It’s been lowered by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: G C D Am Em
There are chords shown for soprano, concert, tenor, and BARITONE ukuleles.
This is the lyric version. The same video without lyrics may be found here: https://youtu.be/Y1xn68ri4xY
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Young The Giant - Superposition
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Superposition on the ukulele by Young The Giant. The chords used are G C D Am Em7.
Link to lead tab - https://www.dropbox.com/sh/kxc996o19ek6m8u/AABipIWg_Nyfq8wdhy7r-E2Za?dl=0
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Train - Calling All Angels
item.description:
Calling All Angles by Train. It’s been lowered by 3 semitones so beginner ukulele players can play along. Chords used: G, C, F, Am, and Dm. The lyric video was created and posted by YouTuber Earthquaker, I simply added the chords. For educational use.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Original Broadway Cast of Hamilton - Satisfied
item.description:
Satisfied from Hamilton. It’s been lowered by 3 semitones so beginner ukulele players can play along. Chord used: Am, D, F, and E7. The lyric video was created and posted by YouTuber LyricsBy Allie, I simply added the chords. The simplified chords were inspired by YouTuber Cory Teaches Music. For educational use.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
